Package me.steep.steepapi.api

Class GeneralAPI

java.lang.Object
me.steep.steepapi.api.GeneralAPI
public class GeneralAPI extends Object
Never make a new GeneralAPI(), just get it via SteepAPI.getGeneralAPI()

    • isOnCooldown

      public boolean isOnCooldown​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String name)
      Parameters:
      player - The player you want to check for
      name - The name of the cooldown
      Returns:
      Whether the specified Cooldown is active

    • getCooldown

      @Nullable public Cooldown getCooldown​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String name)
      Parameters:
      player - The player on cooldown
      name - The name of the cooldown
      Returns:
      The requested Cooldown or null

    • setCooldown

      @NotNull public @NotNull Cooldown setCooldown​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String name, int timeInSeconds)
      Creates a new Cooldown for the player if one under the same name doesn't already exist otherwise it will set the remaining time of the existing Cooldown to the timeInSeconds parameter
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Cooldown, see this as a sort of "group name"
      player - The player that this cooldown will apply to
      timeInSeconds - The time the cooldown lasts in seconds
      Returns:
      The created or edited Cooldown

    • removeCooldown

      public void removeCooldown​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String name)
      Removes the specified Cooldown from the specified Player if it exists.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that has a Cooldown
      name - The name of the Cooldown

    • sendActionBar

      public void sendActionBar​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p, String s)
      Parameters:
      p - The player to send the actionbar to
      s - The text to put in the actionbar (supports color codes)

    • color

      public String color​(String text)
      This method simply colors text using color codes, example: "&aCool" is the same as ChatColor.GREEN + "Cool"
      Parameters:
      text - The text to color
      Returns:
      The colored text

    • isArmor

      public boolean isArmor​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
      Parameters:
      item - The ItemStack to check
      Returns:
      Whether the specified ItemStack is armor

    • isInCombat

      Parameters:
      player - The player to check
      Returns:
      Whether the specified player is in combat
